channel.title: cs.SC updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: cs.SC updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: An algorithm to compute Selmer groups via resolutions by permutations modules
item.description: arXiv:2504.13506v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Given a number field with absolute Galois group $\mathcal{G}$, a finite Galois module $M$, and a Selmer system $\mathcal{L}$, this article gives a method to compute Sel$_\mathcal{L}$, the Selmer group of $M$ attached to $\mathcal{L}$. First we describe an algorithm to obtain a resolution of $M$ where the morphisms are given by Hecke operators. Then we construct another group $H^1_S(\mathcal{G}, M)$ and we prove, using the properties of Hecke operators, that $H^1_S(\mathcal{G}, M)$ is a Selmer group containing Sel$_\mathcal{L}$. Then, we discuss the time complexity of this method.
item.dc:creator: Fabrice Etienne (UB, CANARI, IMB)
